sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT user_fname, user_mobile, user_tpin, scheme_id, balance_amt, created_by AS retailer_creator_id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_username, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, user_email AS admin_email, balance_amt AS admin_balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT user_fname AS rt_creator_user_name, user_mobile AS rt_creator_user_mobile, user_email AS rt_creator_user_email, user_type AS rt_creator_user_type, balance_amt AS rt_creator_balance_amt, scheme_id AS rt_creator_scheme_id, created_by AS dt_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.ds_id}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id, mop.service_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '1000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id, mop.service_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '2000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id, mop.service_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '3000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id, mop.service_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '4000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id, mop.service_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '5000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT id AS api_id, api_code
FROM m_api
WHERE api_code = :P1 /* {{'DMEP'}} */ AND status = 1

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetCommision.operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetRTCreator.rt_creator_scheme_id}} */

SELECT user_fname AS dt_user_name, user_mobile AS dt_user_mobile, user_type AS dt_user_type, scheme_id AS dt_scheme_id, balance_amt AS dt_balance_amt, created_by AS mdt_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE scheme_id = :P1 /* {{GetDTCreator.dt_scheme_id}} */ AND operator_id = :P2 /* {{GetCommision.operator_id}} */

values.value: {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Remainder+' by  '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_fname+' to A/C '+$_POST.BenAcNo+' Mobile: '+$_POST.BenMobileNo}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, amount, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, revert_trans, ip_address, process_mode, tr_date, transaction_by, opening_balance, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, dtcommper, dtcommval, dtcommamt, dtchargeper, dtchargeval, dtchargeamt, mdtcommper, mdtcommval, mdtcommamt, mdtchargeper, mdtchargeval, mdtchargeamt, is_processed, bank_ac_no, remitter_id) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetCommision.operator_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetCommision.service_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetOpAPICodeFwrd.api_id}} */, :P4 /* {{identity}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.BenAcNo}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.RecipientIdTrans}} */, :P7 /* {{Remainder}} */, :P8 /* {{'Android'}} */, :P9 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P10 /* {{'PENDING'}} */, :P11 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P12 /* {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Remainder+' by  '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_fname+' to A/C '+$_POST.BenAcNo+' Mobile: '+$_POST.BenMobileNo}} */, '0', :P13 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P14 /* {{'A2C'}} */, :P15 /* {{NOW}} */, :P16 /* {{identity}} */, :P17 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P18 /* {{GetCommision.comm_per}} */, :P19 /* {{GetCommision.comm_val}} */, :P20 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P21 /* {{GetCommision.service_charge_val}} */, :P22 /* {{GetCommision.service_charge_per}} */, :P23 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P24 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P25 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P26 /* {{DTCommPer}} */, :P27 /* {{DTCommVal}} */, :P28 /* {{DTCommAmt}} */, :P29 /* {{DTChargePer}} */, :P30 /* {{DTChargeVal}} */, :P31 /* {{DTChargeAmt}} */, :P32 /* {{MDTCommPer}} */, :P33 /* {{MDTCommVal}} */, :P34 /* {{MDTCommAmt}} */, :P35 /* {{MDTChargePer}} */, :P36 /* {{MDTChargeVal}} */, :P37 /* {{MDTChargeAmt}} */, :P38 /* {{'N/A'}} */, :P39 /* {{$_POST.BenAcNo}} */, :P40 /* {{$_POST.SenderIdTrans}} */)

params.value: {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Remainder+' by  '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_fname+' to A/C '+$_POST.BenAcNo+' Mobile: '+$_POST.BenMobileNo}}

'+RTNetAmt+' | Ben. Id: '+$_POST.RecipientIdTrans}}

INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{Remainder}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P5 /* {{'Money Transfer'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P10 /* {{'Number:  '+$_POST.BenMobileNo+' | Amount: '+Remainder+'\n | Money Transfer | Ref. Id: '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per:'+GetCommision.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetCommision.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetCommision.service_charge_per+' | Charge Val:   '+GetCommision.service_charge_val+' \n | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | Ben. Id: '+$_POST.RecipientIdTrans}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P14 /* {{'PENDING'}} */)

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, api_logs = :P2 /* {{api_log}} */, is_processed = :P3 /* {{bank_tr_id}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{remarks}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{api_ref}} */, revert_trans = '0', ip_address = :P6 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, api_response_id = :P7 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, live = :P8 /* {{apiResponseTime > 10 ? 'Push' : 'Live'}} */, extra1 = :P9 /* {{ec}} */
WHERE id = :P10 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{DrBalanceRT.identity}} */

INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{Remainder}} */, :P4 /* {{AdminChargesAmt}} */, :P5 /* {{AdminClosingBalance}} */, :P6 /* {{'Money Transfer Charge'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P10 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P11 /* {{'Number:  '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | Amount: '+Remainder+'  | Charge Credit:  '+AdminNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+RechTrans.identity}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{AdminClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_id}} */

sql.query:
SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id, mop.service_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '5000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT id AS api_id, api_code
FROM m_api
WHERE api_code = :P1 /* {{'DMEP'}} */ AND status = 1

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_username, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, user_email AS admin_email, balance_amt AS admin_balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{RepeatGetCommision.operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetRTCreator.rt_creator_scheme_id}} */

SELECT user_fname AS dt_user_name, user_mobile AS dt_user_mobile, user_type AS dt_user_type, scheme_id AS dt_scheme_id, balance_amt AS dt_balance_amt, created_by AS mdt_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRTCreator.dt_creator_id}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE scheme_id = :P1 /* {{GetDTCreator.dt_scheme_id}} */ AND operator_id = :P2 /* {{RepeatGetCommision.operator_id}} */

INSERT INTO tt_balance
